meanings.definition: The state of being outdated or no longer in use.
meanings.sent1: The outdatednesses of the old computer made it difficult to run new software.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed the outdatednesses of ancient tools and gadgets.
meanings.sent3: The outdatednesses of the fashion trend made everyone look like they were from a different era.
meanings.sent4: The outdatednesses of the building's design became more apparent as modern architecture evolved.
meanings.sent5: The outdatednesses of the technology was evident in the clunky design and slow performance.

meanings.definition: The quality of being out of date or old-fashioned.
meanings.sent1: She appreciated the vintage store for its collection of outdatednesses in clothing.
meanings.sent2: The outdatednesses of the furniture gave the room a charming retro feel.
meanings.sent3: His love for outdatednesses in music made him the go-to DJ for throwback parties.
meanings.sent4: The outdatednesses of the car's design harked back to a bygone era of automotive style.
meanings.sent5: The outdatednesses of the decor transported guests to a nostalgic past.
